# Unicode.GeneralCategory.spaceSeparator

**Case**

A space character of non-zero width.

## Declaration

```swift
case spaceSeparator
```

## Discussion

This value corresponds to the category `Space_Separator` (abbreviated `Zs`) in the [https://unicode.org/reports/tr44/#General_Category_Values].
title: Unicode.GeneralCategory.spaceSeparator
